page.title: 13Clubs In Mayfield.
page.content: Mayfield has Clubs and Societies to suit all tastes and age ranges.Firstly there are the sports clubs:Cricket, Darts,Football,Riffle,Tennis and Bowls Clubs cater for many sporting tastes as well as Keep Fit & Dance Clubs.For the children there are Cubs,Brownies, Seekers,Play Group,Mother & Toddler's Group & the Monday Club.For Teenagers there are the Scouts,Guides,Rangers & Youth Club.The elderly in Mayfield have clubs too:the 'Snack & Chat'Club, the Afternoon Women's Institute & the Afternoon Club.Mayfield also has the following societies & clubs:Art Club, the Band,Bingo Club,British Red Cross Society,Conservation Association, Horticultural & Gardeners' Association,Local History Society, Mayfield & Five Ashes Society,National Farmers' Union,Royal British Legion, Evening W.I,& the One Hundred Club.
